data.comment: Today's referee, Yusuke Araki, has blown to start the match.
In Kawasaki Oita attack through Yuya Takazawa. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 1, Goal kick for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Ryota Ohshima gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kawasaki.
Kawasaki are caught offside.
In the minute 5, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Kaoru Mitoma.
Great play from Yasuto Wakizaka to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Kawasaki drive upfield and Kaoru Mitoma gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Oita defender.
Kawasaki drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 16, Yuya Takazawa for Oita is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Oita.
Yusuke Araki awards Oita a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Kawasaki have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Oita at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Kawasaki's Yasuto Wakizaka gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 22, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Goal! Kawasaki extend their lead to 2-0 through Leandro Damiao.
Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
In the minute 28, Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Oita is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
In the minute 38, Kawasaki push forward at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium and Diogo Mateus gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Oita defence.
Throw-in for Kawasaki close to the penalty box.
Oita needs to be cautious. Kawasaki have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 39, Yusuke Araki awards Oita a goal kick.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Kawasaki close to the penalty box.
In the minute 41, Can Kawasaki capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Oita's half?
Yusuke Araki signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Oita's half.
Corner awarded to Oita.
In the minute 44, Oita push forward at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium and Toshio Shimakawa gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Kawasaki defence.
Oita have a goal kick.
Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
In the minute 45, At Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Oita in the half of Kawasaki.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Kawasaki.
Kawasaki surge into the attack at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium but Leandro Damiaoâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
In the minute 47, Yusuke Araki awards the away team a throw-in.
Oita awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
In the minute 49, Goal kick for Oita at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Kawasaki have a dangerous throw-in.
Yusuke Araki signals a throw-in for Kawasaki, close to Oita's area.
In the minute 50, Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Kawasaki's Yu Kobayashi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Oita defender.
Kawasaki's Yu Kobayashi breaks free at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 50, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
Throw-in high up the field for Kawasaki in Kawasaki.
In the minute 54, Yasuto Wakizaka (Kawasaki) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Seigo Kobayashi is replacing Daiki Watari for Oita at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In the minute 56, Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
Kawasaki's Yu Kobayashi gets in a shot on goal at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 60, Yu Kobayashi for Kawasaki drives towards goal at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
In the minute 62, The home team have replaced Yu Kobayashi with Reo Hatate. This is the first substitution made today by Toru Oniki.
Toru Oniki (Kawasaki) is making a second substitution, with Hidemasa Morita replacing Yasuto Wakizaka.
Kazushi Mitsuhira is on a sub for Yuta Koide for Oita.
In the minute 62, Oita make their third substitution with Kaoru Takayama replacing Yuto Misao.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Yusuke Araki signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Oita's half.
In the minute 67, Ao Tanaka hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Kawasaki.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
In the minute 69, Oita awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
Throw-in for Oita in the half of Kawasaki.
In the minute 72, Kawasaki's Reo Hatate is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Oita will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kawasaki.
Toru Oniki is making the team's third substitution at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium with Taisei Miyashiro replacing Kaoru Mitoma.
Manabu Saito is replacing Ryota Ohshima for the home team.
In the minute 78, Yusuke Araki awards Oita a goal kick.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
In Kawasaki a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Kawasaki close to the penalty box.
Ao Tanaka (Kawasaki) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick Kawasaki.
In the minute 80, Manabu Saito (Kawasaki) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
Important block from the Kawasaki defence as Kazushi Mitsuhira fires in a strike for Oita.
In the minute 83, Taisei Miyashiro for Kawasaki gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 85, In Kawasaki Kawasaki attack through Ao Tanaka. The finish is off target, however.
Oita have a goal kick.
The away team replace Toshio Shimakawa with Kazuhiro Sato.
In the minute 85, Kohei Isa is replacing Tatsuya Tanaka for the away team.
Oita are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Can Kawasaki capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Oita's half?
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Kawasaki.
In the minute 87, Toru Oniki is making the team's fifth substitution at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium with Shintaro Kurumaya replacing Kyohei Noborizato.
Yusuke Araki awards the home team a throw-in.
Yusuke Araki will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Throw-in for Oita in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
